## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (64e348f306c46f318ba2eacabad5463cd1ca78c4d9f9bd3db75492641cb2ef5d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sysaid-infra-analytics' @ 0.0.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
